# EEDID.Instance property

Returns a new instance containing all available [`EEDID`](../EEDID.md) structures for this machine.

```csharp
public static EEDID[] Instance { get; }
```

## Return Value

A [`EEDID`](../EEDID.md) array that contains Extended Display Identification Data information for this machine.
